section.title: About Me
section.content: I build modern, reliable, and scalable web applications that help businesses run better. I focus on pragmatic engineering: clean components, reliable APIs, and measurable outcomes. Download my CV for full details.

section.title: Backend Development
section.content: APIs and services with Express.js, Node.js and Python (Flask/Django). I design RESTful endpoints, authentication, and efficient DB schemas.

section.title: Frontend Development
section.content: Interactive, accessible frontends using Vue 3, React, and Tailwind CSS. I build component libraries and reusable UI patterns suitable for corporate apps.

section.title: Databases & DevOps
section.content: Production-ready data systems (PostgreSQL, MongoDB), containerization with Docker, CI pipelines and deployment best practices.

section.title: Languages & Tools
section.content: JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, Java. Git, Docker, Vercel, and modern testing & linting workflows.

experience.title: Web Application Developer
experience.description: Lead feature development for QuickRev: frontend components, backend APIs, and deployment automation. Focused on scalability and customer conversion.

experience.title: System Developer
experience.description: Delivered a complete booking and check-in system. Automated guest workflows and implemented reporting features used during pilot operations.

experience.title: Network Administrator Assistant
experience.description: Supported network maintenance, troubleshooting, and lab environment setup.

projects.title: ADC Hotel Management
projects.description: Enterprise-grade Hotel Management System for bookings, check-in, staff and reporting. Real-world pilot deployment with role-based access and notifications.

caseStudy.problem: Manual check-in and booking caused slow front-desk operations.
caseStudy.solution: Built an integrated system with booking, check-in, staff roles and reporting. Implemented efficient queries and UX to minimize steps.
caseStudy.impact: Reduced average check-in time during pilot; improved staff productivity and reporting insights.

projects.title: QuickRev (AI Reviewer)
projects.description: AI-powered reviewer & flashcard generator that turns source material into study-ready content in one click.

caseStudy.problem: Students spend hours creating study materials manually.
caseStudy.solution: Built a one-click pipeline that generates flashcards using an LLM, with export and review flows.
caseStudy.impact: Significantly reduced content creation time for users; clear UX for rapid iteration.

projects.title: Moviary
projects.description: Clean movie browsing app with search, trending, and accessible UI — built with performance and clean code in mind.

caseStudy.problem: Users want fast, accessible browsing of movies without clutter.
caseStudy.solution: Built an optimized UI and efficient data fetching strategy.
caseStudy.impact: Fast load times and accessible layout; easy to extend for new content sources.

projects.title: Timeny
projects.description: A polished app showing life-expectancy visualizations and calendar insights, built as a fast SPA.

caseStudy.problem: Users want meaningful visualizations of date-based information.
caseStudy.solution: Created an accessible interactive tool with clear visual cues.
caseStudy.impact: High user engagement for novelty and clarity.
